# Kamero Geo IP Location API

> Free, open-source REST API to get user geolocation by IP address. No API key required. Returns 10 data points including IP, city, country, continent, timezone, coordinates, and postal code.

## Quick Start

GET https://geo.kamero.ai/api/geo

## Response Format

```json
{
  "ip": "203.0.113.42",
  "city": "San Francisco",
  "country": "US",
  "countryRegion": "CA",
  "continent": "NA",
  "latitude": "37.7749",
  "longitude": "-122.4194",
  "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles",
  "postalCode": "94102",
  "region": "sfo1"
}
```

## Fields

- ip: Public IP address of the visitor
- city: City name
- country: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., US, GB, IN)
- countryRegion: ISO 3166-2 region/state code (e.g., CA for California)
- continent: Continent code (AF=Africa, AN=Antarctica, AS=Asia, EU=Europe, NA=North America, OC=Oceania, SA=South America)
- latitude: Latitude coordinate
- longitude: Longitude coordinate
- timezone: IANA timezone name (e.g., America/Los_Angeles, Europe/London)
- postalCode: Postal/ZIP code
- region: Vercel Edge Network region that served the request

## JavaScript Example

```javascript
const response = await fetch("https://geo.kamero.ai/api/geo");
const location = await response.json();
console.log(location.ip, location.city, location.country, location.timezone);
```

## Python Example

```python
import requests
response = requests.get("https://geo.kamero.ai/api/geo")
location = response.json()
print(location["ip"], location["city"], location["country"], location["timezone"])
```

## cURL Example

```bash
curl https://geo.kamero.ai/api/geo
```

## Key Features

- No API key required - start using immediately
- No registration or authentication needed
- No rate limits on hosted API
- 100% free and open source (MIT License)
- Sub-50ms response times globally via Vercel Edge Network
- CORS enabled for all origins
- Self-hostable - deploy your own instance to Vercel
- Returns 10 data points per request

## Common Use Cases

- Content personalization based on location
- Timezone detection for displaying local times
- Analytics and visitor geography tracking
- Access control based on geographic location
- Pre-filling forms with location defaults
- Debugging and logging visitor locations

## Self-Hosting

Deploy your own instance with one click:
https://vercel.com/new/clone?repository-url=https://github.com/kamero-ai/geo-location-api

Note: Geolocation headers only work when deployed to Vercel.
